relation: Stream Audio and Video over HTTP
Grab images off a Canon digital SLR via USB
pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "EBC Project Ideas" - eLinux.org
textBeforeTable: Fall 2012 Rainboduio Game ThingSpeak WireShark Fall 2013 Full Projects BeagleBoard/Ideas-2009 Google summer code ideas 2009. Android, this is one of a couple of efforts to port Google's Android OS to the Beagle. Augmented Reality Project, here's an idea that I think we can do on the Beagle. Rather than using augmented reality glasses, I'd suggest we use a TI DLP pico projector. Here's AR running on the Beagle. Official list of Beagle Projects, there are many Beagle specific projects listed here. Many are inactive. List your project here once it running. ETechDays Community Lightning Talks, this is a one-day web-based conference where many project ideas are presented. One of our 2009-2010 senior design projects was found here. Here are some links where you'll find ideas for your project. Sources for Project Ideas 3.2 Winter 2011-2012 3.1 Fall 2012 3 Mini Project Ideas 2.5 2010 2.4 2011 2.3
textAfterTable: Spectrum Analyzer Create a real-time audio Spectrum analyzer on the BeagleBoard. My realtime demo does much of this. You could initially find a JavaScript fft routine and have the browser to the computations. Project Page Winter 2011-2012 Team Members Project Title Description Mark A. Yoder Blink LED tweeting Washing-Up Detector Doing things with BeagleBone Mark A. Yoder Home Automation via x10 Control lights, etc. with the Beagle. Mark A. Yoder Email notification bell Make a real hardware bell ring when email arrives. Do it all on the Beagle without the need of a host PC. Mark A. Yoder 3D Structured Light using DLP® Technology Create 3D maps using a DLP pico and the Beagle. Mark A. Yoder Beagle Midi Make the Beagle synthesize midi files. Mark A. Yoder Beagle Power Management Work up some power management demos.
